callback_with_context.context_function_id: DoIf(manager.SelectedTabKey != record.Key , Do(DoIfElse(record.Sort < manager.SelectedTabIndex, UiMsg("NarrativeTurnPageLeft"), UiMsg("NarrativeTurnPageRight")), SetTabUsingContext(record)))
DoIf(manager.SelectedTabKey != record.Key , Do(DoIfElse(record.Sort < manager.SelectedTabIndex, UiMsg("NarrativeTurnPageLeft"), UiMsg("NarrativeTurnPageRight")), SetTabUsingContext(record)))
